comment: Hi, I am Using Google Translate for 4 years. It was perfect but, Now when you have changed the interface, it is not working fast as it was working earlier. My issue is now it shows only one meaning of a word and also it doesn't shows the meaning in sentences as it was showing. Please fix it.
scenarios: The app shows only one meaning of a word instead of multiple meanings as it did previously.
The app does not show the meaning of words in sentences as it used to.
key sentence: The app shows only one meaning of a word instead of multiple meanings as it did previously.
the function of activity: The activity facilitates translation and navigation:Search, menu, navigate, history, handwriting, options, text entry, paste, language swap, and settings management for user interaction and feedback.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Close Dialog', 'description': 'Close the translation dialog.'}, {'name': 'Change Profile Picture', 'description': 'Change the current profile picture associated with the account.'}, {'name': 'Manage Google Account', 'description': 'Access and manage settings related to the Google Account.'}, {'name': 'Expand Account List', 'description': 'Expand the list of accounts to show more details or options.'}, {'name': 'Downloaded Languages', 'description': 'View and manage languages that have been downloaded for offline use.'}, {'name': 'History', 'description': 'View the history of translations or actions taken within the application.'}, {'name': 'Privacy Policy', 'description': 'View the privacy policy information.'}, {'name': 'Terms of Service', 'description': 'View the terms of service information.'}, {'name': 'Help & Feedback', 'description': 'Access help resources or provide feedback.'}]
